name: Lights Out! 💡
description:
Navigate the path to safety, with the... Lights Out! 💡

(My entry to #LOWREZJAM 2019)

I created the game using Castle, which is a new platform and a community for making, playing, and sharing games. 
(For more information about the Castle platform, check out their site, or read their manifesto)

Features:
  • 🧩 32 Levels
  • 💾 Auto-save Progress
  • 🌐 Global High Score (fastest time, least # deaths)
Controls

    =  Move Player

Thank you for playing! 🙂
